attributes.action: Ban banks from using 0845 numbers and passing cost to their customers
attributes.additional_details: To make all banks have freephone numbers for their customers. Currently banks have 0845 numbers which are very expensive and usually keep you on automated system for around 1/ 2 mins before you can then speak to a human. Enough! Banks should stop passing their costs to the taxpayer and have a freephone number when you need to talk to them!
